00032 CPTableColumnNoResizing         = 0;
00033 CPTableColumnAutoresizingMask   = 1 << 0;
00034 CPTableColumnUserResizingMask   = 1 << 1;
00035 
00036 @implementation CPTableColumn : CPObject
00037 {
00038     CPTableView         _tableView;
00039     CPView              _headerView;

00057 - (id)init
00058 {
00059     return [self initWithIdentifier:@""];
00060 }
00061 
00062 - (id)initWithIdentifier:(id)anIdentifier
00063 {
00064     self = [super init];
00065 
00066     if (self)
00067     {
00068         _dataViewData = { };
00069 
00070         _width = 100.0;
00071         _minWidth = 10.0;
00072         _maxWidth = 1000000.0;
00073         _resizingMask = CPTableColumnAutoresizingMask | CPTableColumnUserResizingMask;
00074         _disableResizingPosting = NO;
00075         
00076         [self setIdentifier:anIdentifier];
00077 
00078         var header = [[_CPTableColumnHeaderView alloc] initWithFrame:CGRectMakeZero()];
00079         [self setHeaderView:header];
00080         
00081         var textDataView = [CPTextField new];
00082         [textDataView setValue:[CPColor colorWithHexString:@"333333"] forThemeAttribute:@"text-color"];
00083         [textDataView setValue:[CPColor whiteColor] forThemeAttribute:@"text-color" inState:CPThemeStateHighlighted];
00084         [textDataView setValue:[CPFont boldSystemFontOfSize:12] forThemeAttribute:@"font" inState:CPThemeStateHighlighted];
00085         [textDataView setValue:CGInsetMake(4.0, 8.0, 0.0, 8.0) forThemeAttribute:@"content-inset"];
00086         [self setDataView:textDataView];
00087     }
00088 
00089     return self;
00090 }

00098 - (CPTableView)tableView
00099 {
00100     return _tableView;

00102 
00103 - (void)setWidth:(float)aWidth
00104 {
00105     aWidth = +aWidth;
00106 
00107     if (_width === aWidth)
00108         return;
00109 
00110     var newWidth = MIN(MAX(aWidth, [self minWidth]), [self maxWidth]);
00111 
00112     if (_width === newWidth)
00113         return;
00114 
00115     var oldWidth = _width;
00116 
00117     _width = newWidth;
00118 
00119     var tableView = [self tableView];
00120 
00121     if (tableView)
00122     {
00123         var index = [[tableView tableColumns] indexOfObjectIdenticalTo:self],
00124             dirtyTableColumnRangeIndex = tableView._dirtyTableColumnRangeIndex;
00125             
00126         if (dirtyTableColumnRangeIndex < 0)
00127             tableView._dirtyTableColumnRangeIndex = index;
00128         else
00129             tableView._dirtyTableColumnRangeIndex = MIN(index,  tableView._dirtyTableColumnRangeIndex);
00130         
00131         var rows = tableView._exposedRows,
00132             columns = [CPIndexSet indexSetWithIndexesInRange:CPMakeRange(index, [tableView._exposedColumns lastIndex] - index + 1)];        
00133         
00134         // FIXME: Would be faster with some sort of -setNeedsDisplayInColumns: that updates a dirtyTableColumnForDisplay cache; then marked columns would relayout their data views at display time.
00135         [tableView _layoutDataViewsInRows:rows columns:columns];
00136         [tableView tile];
00137         
00138         if (!_disableResizingPosting)
00139             [self _postDidResizeNotificationWithOldWidth:oldWidth];
00140     }
00141 }
00142 
00143 - (float)width
00144 {
00145     return _width;
00146 }
00147 
00148 - (void)setMinWidth:(float)aMinWidth
00149 {
00150     aMinWidth = +aMinWidth;
00151 
00152     if (_minWidth === aMinWidth)
00153         return;
00154 
00155     _minWidth = aMinWidth;
00156 
00157     var width = [self width],
00158         newWidth = MAX(width, [self minWidth]);
00159 
00160     if (width !== newWidth)
00161         [self setWidth:newWidth];
00162 }
00163 
00164 - (float)minWidth
00165 {
00166     return _minWidth;
00167 }
00168 
00169 - (void)setMaxWidth:(float)aMaxWidth
00170 {
00171     aMaxWidth = +aMaxWidth;
00172 
00173     if (_maxWidth === aMaxWidth)
00174         return;
00175 
00176     _maxWidth = aMaxWidth;
00177 
00178     var width = [self width],
00179         newWidth = MAX(width, [self maxWidth]);
00180 
00181     if (width !== newWidth)
00182         [self setWidth:newWidth];
00183 }

00199 
00200 - (void)sizeToFit
00201 {
00202     var width = _CGRectGetWidth([_headerView frame]);
00203 
00204     if (width < [self minWidth])
00205         [self setMinWidth:width];
00206     else if (width > [self maxWidth])
00207         [self setMaxWidth:width]
00208 
00209     if (_width !== width)
00210         [self setWidth:width];
00211 }
00212 
00213 //Setting Component Cells
00214 - (void)setHeaderView:(CPView)aView
00215 {
00216     if (!aView)
00217         [CPException raise:CPInvalidArgumentException reason:@"Attempt to set nil header view on " + [self description]];
00218 
00219     _headerView = aView;
00220 
00221     var tableHeaderView = [_tableView headerView];
00222 
00223     [tableHeaderView setNeedsLayout];
00224     [tableHeaderView setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00225 }
00226 
00227 - (CPView)headerView
00228 {
00229     return _headerView;
00230 }
00231 
00232 - (void)setDataView:(CPView)aView
00233 {
00234     if (_dataView === aView)
00235         return;
00236 
00237     if (_dataView)
00238         _dataViewData[[_dataView UID]] = nil;
00239 
00240     _dataView = aView;
00241     _dataViewData[[aView UID]] = [CPKeyedArchiver archivedDataWithRootObject:aView];
00242 }
00243 
00244 - (CPView)dataView
00245 {
00246     return _dataView;
00247 }
00248 
00249 /*
00250     Returns the CPView object used by the CPTableView to draw values for the receiver.
00251 
00252     By default, this method just calls dataView. Subclassers can override if they need to
00253     potentially use different cells for different rows. Subclasses should expect this method
00254     to be invoked with row equal to -1 in cases where no actual row is involved but the table
00255     view needs to get some generic cell info.
00256 */
00257 - (id)dataViewForRow:(int)aRowIndex
00258 {
00259     return [self dataView];
00260 }
00261 
00262 - (id)_newDataViewForRow:(int)aRowIndex
00263 {
00264     var dataView = [self dataViewForRow:aRowIndex],
00265         dataViewUID = [dataView UID];
00266 
00267     var x = [self tableView]._cachedDataViews[dataViewUID];
00268     if (x && x.length)
00269     return x.pop();
00270 
00271     // if we haven't cached an archive of the data view, do it now
00272     if (!_dataViewData[dataViewUID])
00273         _dataViewData[dataViewUID] = [CPKeyedArchiver archivedDataWithRootObject:dataView];
00274 
00275     // unarchive the data view cache
00276     var newDataView = [CPKeyedUnarchiver unarchiveObjectWithData:_dataViewData[dataViewUID]];
00277     newDataView.identifier = dataViewUID;
00278     
00279     return newDataView;
00280 }

00358 - (void)_postDidResizeNotificationWithOldWidth:(float)oldWidth
00359 {
00360     [[CPNotificationCenter defaultCenter]
00361     postNotificationName:CPTableViewColumnDidResizeNotification
00362                   object:[self tableView]
00363                 userInfo:[CPDictionary dictionaryWithObjects:[self, oldWidth] forKeys:[@"CPTableColumn", "CPOldWidth"]]];
00364 }

00368 var CPTableColumnIdentifierKey   = @"CPTableColumnIdentifierKey",
00369     CPTableColumnHeaderViewKey   = @"CPTableColumnHeaderViewKey",
00370     CPTableColumnDataViewKey     = @"CPTableColumnDataViewKey",
00371     CPTableColumnWidthKey        = @"CPTableColumnWidthKey",
00372     CPTableColumnMinWidthKey     = @"CPTableColumnMinWidthKey",
00373     CPTableColumnMaxWidthKey     = @"CPTableColumnMaxWidthKey",
00374     CPTableColumnResizingMaskKey = @"CPTableColumnResizingMaskKey";
00375 
00376 @implementation CPTableColumn (CPCoding)
00377 
00378 - (id)initWithCoder:(CPCoder)aCoder
00379 {
00380     self = [super init];
00381 
00382     if (self)
00383     {
00384         _dataViewData = { };
00385 
00386         _width = [aCoder decodeFloatForKey:CPTableColumnWidthKey];
00387         _minWidth = [aCoder decodeFloatForKey:CPTableColumnMinWidthKey];
00388         _maxWidth = [aCoder decodeFloatForKey:CPTableColumnMaxWidthKey];
00389 
00390         [self setIdentifier:[aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPTableColumnIdentifierKey]];
00391     //    [self setHeaderView:[aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPTableColumnHeaderViewKey]];
00392     //    [self setDataView:[aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPTableColumnDataViewKey]];
00393 
00394         [self setHeaderView:[CPTextField new]];
00395         [self setDataView:[CPTextField new]];
00396 
00397 
00398     //    _resizingMask  = [aCoder decodeBoolForKey:CPTableColumnResizingMaskKey];
00399     }
00400 
00401     return self;
00402 }
00403 
00404 - (void)encodeWithCoder:(CPCoder)aCoder
00405 {
00406     [aCoder encodeObject:_identifier forKey:CPTableColumnIdentifierKey];
00407 
00408     [aCoder encodeObject:_width forKey:CPTableColumnWidthKey];
00409     [aCoder encodeObject:_minWidth forKey:CPTableColumnMinWidthKey];
00410     [aCoder encodeObject:_maxWidth forKey:CPTableColumnMaxWidthKey];
00411 
00412 //    [aCoder encodeObject:_headerView forKey:CPTableColumnHeaderViewKey];
00413 //    [aCoder encodeObject:_dataView forKey:CPTableColumnDataViewKey];
00414 
00415 //    [aCoder encodeObject:_resizingMask forKey:CPTableColumnResizingMaskKey];
00416 }
